holidays.title: Sukkot
holidays.description: A Jewish holiday also known as the Feast of Booths.

holidays.title: World Food Day
holidays.description: Where would we be without food? We certainly wouldn’t be at Starbucks, grocery stores or restaurants.

holidays.title: Dictionary Day
holidays.description: Webster was a true pioneer for creating the reference book we use so ubiquitously!

holidays.title: Global Cat Day
holidays.description: Educating, engaging, and empowering people to defend and protect cats is the right thing to do.

holidays.title: Hagfish Day
holidays.description: Today, we learn that, although not cuties, these creatures play an important role in nature.

holidays.title: Myanmar Full Moon of Thadingyut
holidays.description: Buddhist Lent, which commemorates Buddha's return to earth, concludes on this day.

holidays.title: National Boss's Day
holidays.description: If you are blessed with a great boss, you could call ‘em a boss boss.

holidays.title: National BRA Day
holidays.description: Together, let’s honor the strong women fighting breast cancer and help them make informed decisions.

holidays.title: National Department Store Day
holidays.description: Get ready as we explore department stores and their fascinating history today.

holidays.title: ​National Fossil Day
holidays.description: Show some appreciation for these incredible “time capsules” and the paleontologists who excavate them.

holidays.title: ​National Liqueur Day
holidays.description: Liqueurs are basically alcoholic beverages made from distilled spirits — with lots of added flavors.

holidays.title: National Take Your Parents To Lunch Day
holidays.description: Got parents? Take them to lunch. Got kids? Let them treat you to a school lunch.

holidays.title: National Veterans BBQ Day
holidays.description: Treat veterans around you with a smoking barbeque cookout and drinks on this day.

holidays.title: Support Your Local Chamber of Commerce Day
holidays.description: Don’t forget to thank your local chambers of commerce for their contribution to sustaining the economy!

holidays.title: Unity Day
holidays.description: This is the signature event of National Bullying Prevention Month.

holidays.title: World Allergy Awareness Day
holidays.description: Discover all the ways to eliminate, and not exacerbate your allergies.

holidays.title: World Spine Day
holidays.description: When your spine hurts, everything hurts. Here’s why World Spine Day is so important!

holidays.title: Aliya Janell’s Birthday
holidays.description: Aliya Janell's popularity stems from her dance abilities and her accurate fashion sense.

holidays.title: Angela Lansbury’s Birthday
holidays.description: This accomplished actress is one of the last starts of Hollywood's Golden Age!

holidays.title: Angry Grandpa’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube sensation has impacted the platform and will always be remembered.

holidays.title: Aphmau’s Birthday
holidays.description: Aphmau is a YouTube star who creates videos of herself playing “Minecraft.”

holidays.title: Bob Weir’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famed rock icon is more than just a great guitarist — he’s the stuff of legends!

holidays.title: Carmen Pritchett’s Birthday
holidays.description: The decorated YouTube star has gained millions of views about her personal life.

holidays.title: Flea’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this outstanding multi-talented bassist and actor, age is just a number.

holidays.title: Hema Malini’s Birthday
holidays.description: Hema Malini is one of the most well-known and successful actresses in Bollywood.

holidays.title: Ilya Fedorovich’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fedorovich is a social media star from Los Angeles who has an entrepreneurial mind.

holidays.title: John Mayer’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gifted star has accomplished a lot and isn't showing any signs of slowing down.

holidays.title: Kai Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Skill, determination, and resilience continue to shape this social media personality’s career.

holidays.title: Manute Bol’s Birthday
holidays.description: A legendary and inspiring sports career built with determination, skill, and discipline.

holidays.title: Naomi Osaka’s Birthday
holidays.description: Osaka is the first Asian player to earn the number one position in tennis singles.

holidays.title: Oscar Wilde’s Birthday
holidays.description: Oscar Wilde is most well known for his final play, “The Importance of Being Earnest.”

holidays.title: Paul Edwin Zimmer’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paul Edwin Zimmer was a founding member of the Society for Creative Anachronism.

holidays.title: Ruby Rose Turner’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s not only reaching for the stars, she’s dancing with them, too!

holidays.title: Suzanne Somers’s Birthday
holidays.description: Suzanne worked as a model to support her son and ended up being a TV star.

holidays.title: Tom Schwartz’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented actor, entrepreneur, and model believes in good luck and good timing.
